body: The settlement is a haven for spellcasters due to its location; for example, it may lie at the convergence of multiple ley lines or near a well-known magical site. (Increase base value by 20%; increase purchase limit by 20%; increase spellcasting by 2 levels)
name: Magically Attuned
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Settlements/Settlements in Play/Settlement Qualities/Magically Attuned
